mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hale Family Cemetery-Dusty Rock Rd. Alum Ridge District
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
This cemetery is located behind 951 Dusty Rock Rd. NW. It is a large , fenced and well maintained area with relatively few graves. It is visible using Google Earth and Google Maps.
N 36 58.259' W 80 25.591'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
